ygData.subject: Re: More Singaporean Players
ygData.msgSnippet: I was On EQ last nite an met Gary. He was most Helpful. Thx Gary, for that 3 pp and the guidance u provided. I m  indebted to  u ... Today i met another
ygData.messageBody:
I was On EQ last nite an met Gary. He was most Helpful.
Thx Gary, for that 3 pp and the guidance u provided. I'm indebted to u
:)

Today i met another Singaporean, living and working in Canada.
His Character name: Kiasu (no second guess here) , a lvl 21 Mage. There
another Singaporen with him i havent met. a lvl20+ too
They were on their way to the South Ro and beyond, probably the Grobb and
Innothule swamp.

Some questions:
1) do u guys save on those practice points for something later? like.. Feign
Death?
2) Any "spare" mesh armor u guy wanna sell? (to me)
3) Whats the usual time U ppl play in EQ?

laterz
